DOC.brief_title: Assessment Alterations Immune Function During Pregnancy Post Parturition
DOC.detailed_description: Traditionally , suggest pregnancy cause immunosuppressive state would facilitate fetal tolerance result increase susceptibility infection . Although suppression characterize global T-cell defect , observation increase susceptibility restrict specific intracellular bacteria virus consistent regulation certain component innate immune system . Progress treatment management infection pregnancy require understanding change immune system occur pregnancy . It hypothesize fundamental down-regulation innate immune system occur pregnancy remain delivery change serum cytokine influence na ( SqrRoot ) CD4 differentiation different subpopulation . To end , study evaluate blood sample draw pregnant woman early , mid , late pregnancy post-partum change innate immune system compare data similar cohort woman childbearing age exist database healthy , non-pregnant woman . Changes cytokine profile , gene expression microarray , lymphocyte natural killer ( NK ) cell population identify . We may perform neutrophil analysis . We evaluate toll-like receptor functionality , change PBMC throughout pregnancy . We also plan evaluate serum cytokine panel , PBMC flow cytometry , PBMC microarray gene expression , administration influenza vaccine 20 40 pregnant subject . Antibody level measure well . A comparison observe change make previously report vitro vivo study .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : All pregnant study subject must : Be ages 1845 year old . Have positive pregnancy test ( urine ) . Be estimate gestational age 10 20 week either ultrasound LMP . Have identify primary care provider pregnancy . Be willing sign collaborative study consent form CHI . Be willing sample collect stored future research immunological study Be willing sign collaborative study consent form normal volunteer CHI Up twenty pregnant subject agree receive seasonal influenza vaccine must : Have history allergic reaction vaccine content Not receive vaccine provider flu season Agree additional 20cc blood drawn Day +1 Day +7 postvaccine immune analysis . EXCLUSION CRITIERIA : A subject exclude : Has identify underlie chronic medical condition may adversely affect immune system ( e.g. , autoimmune , HIV , hematologic ) need immunomodulating medication ( e.g. , oral steroid ) within 30 day prior conception suspect immune disorder . Oral steroid use reason must discontinue least 30 day prior participation . Is find Hemoglobin read less 8g/dL . Has medical condition , opinion Principal Investigator , pose unacceptable risk subject participation study .
